text: Chilikidara railway station is a railway station on the East Coast Railway network in the state of Odisha, India. It serves Chilikidara village. Its code is CLDR. It has two platforms. Passenger, MEMU, Express trains halt at Basantapur railway station. ==Major Trains== * Puri – Barbil Express ==See also== * Kendujhar district ==References== Category:Railway stations in Kendujhar district Category:Khurda Road railway division
title: Chilikidara railway station
